text: Six World Trade Center was an eight-story building in Lower Manhattan, New York City. It was part of the original World Trade Center complex of buildings. It was opened in 1973. It served as the U.S. Customs House for 28 years. On September 11, 2001, the building was badly damaged from the fall of the North Tower (WTC 1) of the World Trade Center during the 9/11 attacks. The building was demolished later that year.The New York Times. "A Nation Challenged: The Site." October 13, 2001. The new One World Trade Center is built on its site. ==References== ==Other websites== *Emporis entry on Six World Trade Center *Tenants of Six World Trade Center via CNN Category:Buildings and structures in Manhattan Category:September 11 attacks Category:1973 establishments in New York (state) Category:2001 disestablishments in the United States Category:2000s disestablishments in New York (state)
title: 6 World Trade Center
